Text: "The Mark on the Wall" is the first published story by Virginia Woolf.

1:
--------------------
<Text: The Mark on the Wall:  It was published in 1917 as part of the first collection of short stories written by Virginia Woolf and her husband, Leonard Woolf, called "Two Stories".>
Triplets:<Virginia Woolf
